title: From shuttle driver to caddie: Broughton grad grabs the bag at REX Open
content: Pro golfer Dawie van der Walt was a last-minute addition to the REX Open this week as an alternate. The only thing he didn't have in Raleigh? A caddie. Enter Dilan Bat-haee, a recent Broughton High School grad who thought he'd spend the week volunteering for the player shuttle at TPC Wakefield.
